txt.en: 'The people of Lancrath will be safe in my care!'
'I shall aid the people of Sardol in keeping the Enemy from these lands!'
'I hope we shall play more than a small role in your tale!'
'What might! I am glad you have come to aid us, my friend.'
'Hail, my friend. You have come a long way from home, haven't you?'
'Who are you to bow to me? I am honoured by your presence in the vale!'
'I am flattered, traveller, but it is you who should be celebrated!'
'Finally someone shall take the fight to the Enemy!'
'May you be safe in your journeys through the vale!'
'I can rest easier now knowing you fight for us!'
